io.grpc.inprocess

Class InProcessServerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.grpc.AbstractServerBuilder<InProcessServerBuilder>
      • io.grpc.inprocess.InProcessServerBuilder

  • public final class InProcessServerBuilder
extends AbstractServerBuilder<InProcessServerBuilder>
    Builder for a server that services in-process requests. Clients identify the in-process server by its name.

    The server is intended to be fully-featured, high performance, and useful in testing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.grpc.AbstractServerBuilder

      • buildEssentials

        protected AbstractServerBuilder.ServerEssentials buildEssentials()
        Description copied from class: AbstractServerBuilder
        Children of AbstractServerBuilder should override this method to provide transport specific information for the server. This method is mean for Transport implementors and should not be used by normal users.
        Specified by:
        buildEssentials in class AbstractServerBuilder<InProcessServerBuilder>
